This repository uses a formal Canon system.

Primary authority:
- docs/canon/README_CANON.md
- docs/canon/CONSTITUTION.md


For Admin Console work, read docs/architecture/admin/README.md + relevant page spec before changes.

Language rules are mandatory:
- Never use buy, order, checkout, discount
- Always use join, commit, campaign, escrow

If instructions conflict, Canon wins.
Do not assume retail or marketplace behavior.
